00036 static const TraceClass CLI_WIN_CONSOLE("CLI_WIN_CONSOLE", Help()
00037     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "CLI Windows console traces")
00038     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Traces de la console Windows du CLI"));

00061 
00062 const KEY Console::GetKey(void) const
00063 {
00064     while (1)
00065     {
00066         const int i_Char = getch();
00067         GetTraces().Trace(CLI_WIN_CONSOLE) << "i_Char = " << i_Char << endl;
00068         switch (i_Char)
00069         {
00070             case 8:
00071                 return BACKSPACE;
00072             case 224: // Escaped characters.
00073                 const int i_Char2 = getch();
00074                 GetTraces().Trace(CLI_WIN_CONSOLE) << "i_Char2 = " << i_Char2 << endl;
00075                 switch (i_Char2)
00076                 {
00077                     case 71:    return KEY_BEGIN;
00078                     case 72:    return KEY_UP;
00079                     case 73:    return PAGE_UP;
00080                     case 75:    return KEY_LEFT;
00081                     case 77:    return KEY_RIGHT;
00082                     case 79:    return KEY_END;
00083                     case 80:    return KEY_DOWN;
00084                     case 81:    return PAGE_DOWN;
00085                     //case 83:    return DELETE;
00086                 }
00087                 break;
00088             default:
00089                 const KEY e_Char = IODevice::GetKey(i_Char);
00090                 if (e_Char != NULL_KEY)
00091                 {
00092                     return e_Char;
00093                 }
00094         }
00095     }
00096 }
00097 
00098 void Console::PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const
00099 {
00100     printf("%s", STR_Out);
00101 }
